html:
Form A

SCHEDULE |See Rule 2(1)|

EMPLOYEE REGISTER

[Part-A : For all Establishnments]

Name of the Establishment {{ doc.company or ' ' }}   Name of Owner _________________   LIN _________________

1. SL. No.:  

2. Employce Code:  {{ doc.employee or ' ' }}

3. Name:  {{ doc.first_name or ' ' }}

4. Surmame:  {{ doc.last_name or ' ' }}

5. Gender:  {{ doc.gender or ' ' }}

6. Father's / Spouse Name:  {{ doc.middle_name or ' ' }}

7. Date of Birth:  {{ frappe.utils.get_datetime(doc.date_of_birth).strftime('%d-%m-%Y') or ' ' }}

8. Nationality:  {{ doc.custom_nationality or ' ' }}

9. Education Level:  {% for level in doc.education %}{% if level.idx == 1 %}{{ level.level }}{% endif %}{% endfor %}

10. Date of Joining:  {{ frappe.utils.get_datetime(doc.date_of_joining).strftime('%d-%m-%Y') or ' ' }}

11. Designation:  {{ doc.designation or ' ' }}

12. Category Address *(HS/ S/ SS / US):  

13. Type Of Employment:  {{ doc.employment_type or ' ' }}

14. Mobile:  {{ doc.cell_number or ' ' }}

15. UAN:  {{ doc.uan_number or ' ' }}

16. PAN:  {{ doc.pan_number or ' ' }}

17. ESIC IP:  {{ doc.esi_number or ' ' }}

18. LWF:  

19. ADHAAR:  {{ doc.aadhaar_number or ' ' }}

20. Bank Alc Number:  {{ doc.bank_ac_no or ' ' }}

21. Bank:  {{ doc.bank_name or ' ' }}

22. Branch (IFSC):  {{ doc.ifsc_code or ' ' }}

23. Present Address:  {{ doc.current_address or ' ' }}

24. Permanent:  {{ doc.permanent_address or ' ' }}

25. Service Book No.:  

26. Date of Exit:  {{ frappe.utils.get_datetime(doc.relieving_date).strftime('%d-%m-%Y') or ' ' }}

27. Reason for Exit:  {{ doc.reason_for_leaving or ' ' }}

28. Mark of ldentification:  {{ doc.identity_mark or ' ' }}

29. Specinen Signature / Thumb Impression:  

30. Remarks:  

*(Highly Skilled Skilled/Semi Skilled/Un Skilled)

#Note: In case the age is between 14 to 18 years, mention the nature of work, daily hours of work and Intervals of rest in the remarks Column
name: FORM A

html:
FORM 'F'

[See sub-rule(1) of rule 6]

Nomination

To __________________________________________________________________________________________________________

[Give here name or description of the establishment with full address]

I, Shri/ Shrimati/ Kumari ___________________ whose particulars are given in the statement below,

[Name in full here]

hereby nominate the person(s) mentioned below to receive the gratuity payable after my death as also the gratuity standing to my credit in the event of my death before that amount has become payable, or having become payable has not been paid and direct that the said amount of gratuity shall be paid in proportion indicated against the name(s) of the nominee(s).


  1. I hereby certify that the person(s) mentioned is a/are member(s) of my family with in the meaning of clause (h) of section (2) of the Payment of Gratuity Act, 1972.

  2. I hereby declare that I have no family within the meaning of clause (h) of section (2) of the said Act.

  3. (a) My father/ mother/ parent is/are not dependant on me.
    (b) My husband's father/ mother/ parents is/are not dependant on my husband.

  4. I have excluded my husband from my family by a notice date the _______ to the controlling authority in terms of the proviso to clause (h) of section 2 of the said Act.

  5. Nomination made herein in validates my previous nomination.

Nominee(S)


Name in full with full address of nominee(s) Relationship with the employee Age of nominee Proportion by which the gratuity will be shared
1.
2.
3.
so on.

Statement

  1. Name of employee in full
  2. Sex.
  3. Religion.
  4. Whether unmarried/ married/ widow/ widower.
  5. Department/ Branch/ Section where employed.
  6. Post held with Ticket or Serial No., if any.
  7. Date of appointment
  8. Permanent address.

Village _________________ Thana ________________ Sub-division _________________ Post Office _______________

Place
Date

Signature/ Thumb impression
of the employee

Nomination signed/ thumb impressed before me.

thereof.

Date

Signature of the employee
name: Gratuity Form F Nomination

html:
TO,

{{ doc.employee_name or "" }}

{{ doc.permanent_address or "" }}

{{ doc.employee or "" }}


SUBJECT: CONFIRMATION LETTER.


Please refer Your appointment letter dated {{ doc.appointment_letter_date or "" }} where in you were appointed on probation for a period of {{ doc.probation_period or "" }} months which is due to end on {{ doc.probation_period_end_date or "" }}. Based on your performance during probation period, the management is pleased to confirm you in the services of the company with effect from {{ doc.employment_start_date or "" }} as {{ doc.designation or "" }}. You will continue to be governed by terms and conditions of your appointment letter.

We are sure that you will exhibit high commitment with utmost sincerity and dedication and will continue to strive for better results in furtherance of the interest of the company.

We look forward to you having a long and fruitful relationship with company.



Your Sincerely
name: Confirmation Letter
